definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Art education has produced armies of learned bores.
sentences.chinese: 藝術教育同樣造就出了一羣有學識卻令人生厭的人。

sentences.english: As the years went by his nastiness began to annoy his readers.
sentences.chinese: 年深日久，他惡毒的文字開始讓讀者生厭。

sentences.english: A person who never suffers from self-doubt may be insufferable.
sentences.chinese: 一個從未經歷過自我懷疑的人也許會令他人生厭。

sentences.english: It was a disgusting sight, that bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 那是間讓人一望而生厭的浴室。
外出觀光他從來不生厭。

sentences.english: I am mistaken for their granddad - or an old tramp. And my tales of past travels bore them.
sentences.chinese: 他們已經對我過去的旅行故事生厭了。

sentences.english: There is nothing uglier than arrogance.
sentences.chinese: 沒有什麼比傲慢更令人生厭。

sentences.english: Will it ever cloy , this odd diversity of misery and joy?
sentences.chinese: 在這痛苦和快樂的交重中，我會否生厭？

sentences.english: Will it repel, as did the tainted-milk scandal?
sentences.chinese: 會像毒奶粉醜聞那樣使人恐懼生厭嗎？
外出觀光從不使他生厭。
過於油膩的食物很快令人生厭。

sentences.english: That is the unwelcome price of sorting out a banking crisis.
sentences.chinese: 這是整頓金融危機所付出的令人生厭的代價。
那是個令人生厭的會議。

definition: cups and dishes in complete disorder (idiom); after a riotous drinking party
lit. if thrown on the floor, it will make a sound (idiom)/fig. (of one's words) powerful and resonating/to have substance
not recognizing one's family (idiom); self-centered and not making any allowances for the needs of one's relatives
to feel hatred/to harbor a grudge
lit. laughs, jeers, anger and invective (idiom)/fig. all kinds of emotions/to mock and scold/(of writing) freely roving/following the author's fancy
to be reluctant to give up a post
to have no sense of shame/brazen
to keep on the right side of everyone (idiom)/warm and affable
lit. seeing others go hunting, one is excited by memories of the thrill of the hunt (idiom)/fig. seeing others do what one loves to do, one is inspired to try it again
hard to tell if it's real or sham
lit. draw legs on a snake (idiom); fig. to ruin the effect by adding sth superfluous/to overdo it
